::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Roddy and Kup were now right on Trelos' tail.

Rodimus Prime: Prisoner, stand down or we'll be forced to destroy you!

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                               Trelos dodged to the side as Ravenchief dive-bombed him.  As soon as
 he had avoided the shots, he was forced back the other direction by
 Doc's warning shots.
 
 A normal bot would have transformed and fought, but Trelos' stronger
 rabid-dog instincts told him to run, so run he did.
 
 "I missed!" shouted Ravenchief into the radio.
 
 Perseus sighed, the replied, "Next time wait for my signal.  Here's
 the situation, Salveo and his team were forced to turn back, Doc,
 you're now the only one on that side.  Ravenchief, get between the
 prisoner and the base. We're almost there."
 
 Perseus waited for the others to catch up then continued pursuing the target.
 
 Meanwhile...
 
 Salveo and Guardia reached the lower floor and moved slowly to the jail cell.
 
 "Prisoner!  We mean you no harm, we needed to keep you there until we
 could ask you a few questions." he shouted after turning off the alarm
 in the security booth.
 
 "Friend or foe?" added Guardia, drawing her weapon and waiting for a response.
 
 OOC: I think we were holding Blacknightmare until Perseus could
 question her.  Also, I think Kenzo disabled her weapons.
 
 Tag: Doc, Rodimus, Blacknightmare, everyone else in Atlantis.
